war_planner.description: Extends the time to recall armies from an operation from 5 to 10 minutes.

forced_march.description: If the paladin leads a support operation, the army will move at cavalry speed.

faithful_paladin.description: Attacking armies accompanied by the paladin always fight at full strength even without a church.

delivery.description: The player can send resources to other villages.

headquarter.description: The one and only headquarter. Used for construction. Building level decreases construction time for buildings.

barracks.description: Allows recruiting of units. Building level decreases recruiting time for units.

tavern.description: Enables scouting and counter measures. Building level increases the amount of resources you can spend for your spies.

hospital.description: Resurrects fallen units. Building level increases the number of units that can be treated in hospital.

preceptory.description: Introduces special Orders. Building level influences different stats for each Order. Thieves Guild: Costs of noblemen. Knight Templars: Costs of defensive infantry units. Teutonic Knights: Costs of offensive cavalry units.

chapel.description: A chapel is a chapel is a chapel.

church.description: Removes battle malus for the province. Building level increases base morale.

rally_point.description: Army Management and access to different military tools. Building level increases the time to cancel actions.

market.description: Enables market screen. Building level increases number of available traders.

timber_camp.description: Produces Wood. Building level increases production rate.

clay_pit.description: Produces Clay. Building level increases production rate.

iron_mine.description: Produces Iron. Building level increases production rate.

farm.description: Produces Food. Building level increases population limit.

warehouse.description: Resource storage. Building level increases storage limit.

wall.description: Protects village. Building level increases defense bonus.

WorldConfig/config.world_open_phase_message: The World {worldid} has been open phase!
